page.title: 05Things we like at school
page.content: Our favourite thing at school is the games lesson.Jamie,Stuart,James,Ingrid Colette,Tina,Marie and Elaine. Tina enjoys English best of all,although she is good at Maths. Most of the children enjoy writing stories,some like adventures,some love stories and some enjoy poems. Ingrid,Elaine,Jamie and Peter are very good at Maths.Marie,Jane,Colette and Elaine are excellent at creative writing. About fifty percent of the children enjoy drawing and colouring,although some think that they are rather bad at it. The music that we do includes playing the recorder and we all enjoy singing.We sing together in an operetta once a year.This year it was about the {Domesday Survey 1086.
